animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in a puddle. Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am often yellow when I am young
💧 I love playing in the water!

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫️ I am often black and white

animal.question: I meow and purr. I love to chase string and sometimes catch mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn
💤 I like to nap in sunny spots

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones
🗣️ I can be trained to do tricks

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts! What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am the largest land animal
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia

animal.question: I have a long neck and spots. I'm tall and I eat leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I love to eat leaves from tall trees
🤎 I have brown spots all over my body

animal.question: I roar loudly and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am often called the 'King of the Jungle'

animal.question: I hop and have a pouch for my baby. I love to eat eucalyptus leaves. Who am I?

hints.text: 👶 I carry my baby in my pouch

animal.question: I slither and hiss. Some of us are poisonous. What am I?

hints.text: 👅 I stick out my tongue to smell

animal.question: I am black and white and love to eat bamboo. I am from China. Who am I?

plant.question: I have leaves and a stem, and I need water to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I start as a tiny seed.

plant.question: I am red and round and grow on a vine. You can eat me in a salad or on a sandwich. What am I?

hints.text: ❤️ I am the color of love!
🍅 I am often used in ketchup.
🥪 I taste great on a BLT.

plant.question: I have a trunk, branches, and leaves. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am a flower that follows the sun. My seeds are tasty to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I look like a tiny sun.
🐿️ Animals and people like to eat my seeds.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful petals. People often give me as a gift. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 Watch out for my sharp parts!

plant.question: I am green and leafy, and you can eat me raw in a salad. Rabbits love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 Bugs Bunny loves to eat me.

plant.question: I grow in the ground, and I am orange. Rabbits and horses love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I help you see in the dark (maybe!).

plant.question: I am a tall grass that makes a yellow vegetable. You can pop me and eat it at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I can be popped into a treat.
🧈 I taste good with butter and salt.

plant.question: I am a fruit that grows on a tree and I am usually yellow. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?
I am a plant with a brown stem and I grow underground. You can boil or fry me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I can be made into fries!
